message: Hi Bob, I'm offering you my product for $12,000. I believe this is a fair price given its value to you. Let me know what you think!
I appreciate your offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $9,000. I believe this is a fair price considering the value the product brings to me.

Bob, I understand your position, but $9,000 is a bit too low for me.  I'm willing to come down to $10,500. This price still allows me to make a reasonable profit, and it's closer to the value you place on the product. Let's try to reach an agreement.
I'm still a bit hesitant about the price. I was thinking more along the lines of $9,800. I'm willing to meet you halfway, but I need to make sure I'm getting a good deal.
